newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Karachi port handles 69,736 tonnes cargo.
newsitem.headline: Karachi port handles 69,736 tonnes cargo.

text.p: Pakistan's Karachi Port Trust said it had handled 69,736 tonnes of export and import cargo in the 24 hours to 7 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Tuesday, compared to 91,943 tonnes in the previous 24 hours.
In the past 24 hours, five ships sailed and four berthed. In the next 24 hours seven were expected to sail and nine were expected to arrive.
Berthing schedule of major vessels unloading or expected to unload at the Karachi Port:
